argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clmvsdir.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | clmvsdir.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | clmvsdir.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 4 |  | clmvsdir.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 5 |  | clmvsdir.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_clmadd | |- ( W e. CMod -> + = ( +g ` F ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveqd | |- ( W e. CMod -> ( Q + R ) = ( Q ( +g ` F ) R ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( W e. CMod -> ( ( Q + R ) .x. X ) = ( ( Q ( +g ` F ) R ) .x. X ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ ( Q e. K /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( ( Q + R ) .x. X ) = ( ( Q ( +g ` F ) R ) .x. X ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_clmlmod | |- ( W e. CMod -> W e. LMod ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` F ) = ( +g ` F ) |
| 12 | 1, 5, 2, 3, 4, 11 | #P_lmodvsdir | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( Q e. K /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( ( Q ( +g ` F ) R ) .x. X ) = ( ( Q .x. X ) .+ ( R .x. X ) ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ ( Q e. K /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( ( Q ( +g ` F ) R ) .x. X ) = ( ( Q .x. X ) .+ ( R .x. X ) ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ ( Q e. K /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( ( Q + R ) .x. X ) = ( ( Q .x. X ) .+ ( R .x. X ) ) ) |
